MODAL_AUTHORIZATION_IN_SYSTEM_DESCRIPTIO: To continue, you must enter your authorization data.
MODAL_AUTHORIZATION_RECOVERY_DESCRIPTION: To recover your password, you must provide a login or email address associated with your account. An email will be sent to you with a recovery link.
MODAL_ENTRY_COMMENT_DELETE_DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to delete a comment on this post? The action cannot be undone.
MODAL_COMMENT_SHOW_DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to show this comment again?
MODAL_COMMENT_HIDE_DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to hide this comment?
MODAL_COMMENT_HIDEN_REASON_DELETED: The comment was deleted by the user.
COMMENT_PREMODERATION_BANNED_WORDS_DETEC: Presence of stop words or stop phrases
COMMENT_PREMODERATION_EXTERNAL_LINKS_DET: Availability of links to external resources
ENTRY_COMMENT_TEXTAREA_PLACEHOLDER: How would you like to comment on this?
PAGE_ENTRY_COMMENTS_NOT_FOUND_LABEL: There are no comments for this entry.
PAGE_REGISTRATION_CONFIRMATION_SUCCESS_D: Dear user, your email address has been successfully verified!
PAGE_REGISTRATION_CONFIRMATION_FAIL_DESC: Dear user, confirmation of your email address was unsuccessful due to technical reasons.
PAGE_REGISTRATION_CANCELLATION_SUCCESS_D: Your registration request has been successfully canceled and your account has been deleted.
PAGE_REGISTRATION_CANCELLATION_FAIL_DESC: Your registration application was not canceled due to technical reasons.
PAGE_ERROR_404_DESCRIPTION: Unfortunately, the page you are looking for at "%s" has been deleted or moved. We recommend returning to the main page.
PAGE_ERROR_500_DESCRIPTION: Unfortunately, an error occurred on the server side that does not allow us to process your request. We recommend returning to the main page.
PAGE_ERROR_503_DESCRIPTION: Unfortunately, access to this page is limited. We recommend returning to the main page.
PAGE_ERROR_UNKNOWN_DESCRIPTION: Unfortunately, something went wrong. We recommend returning to the main page.
